mainmenu module¶

Module implementing the main menu of the application.

class mainmenu.MainMenu(parent, controller)[source]¶

Bases: CTkFrame

Class representing the main menu of the application. Inherits from customtkinter.CTkFrame.

Parameters:

  • parent (customtkinter.CTkBaseClass) – Parent widget.

  • controller (App) – Application controller.
